pageProduct.name: Aveeno Active Naturals Skin Relief Moisturising Cream Fragrance Free 312g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

AVEENO® Skin Relief Moisturising Cream Menthol 312g

Aveeno Skin Relief Moisturising Cream deeply moisturising cream has been clinically proven to provide long-lasting moisturisation to relieve dry, flaky, itchy and cracked skin. This patented formula with natural colloidal oatmeal, cocoa and shea butter, and menthol provides intense moisture to soothe and protect extra dry and chapped skin. This rich cream provides a non-greasy, protective barrier to help repair cracked skin and prevent future dryness - leaving skin moisturised for 24 hours so skin is left feeling nothing but soft and smooth all day long. It's even great on rough areas like heels, elbows and knees.


Active Naturals are ingredients derived from nature and uniquely formulated to reveal skin&'s natural health and beauty.


Essential Active Naturals: Skin-nourishing colloidal oatmeal.

Size: 312g

Shelf Life in Days: 1095 days

KEY FEATURES

• Skin Relief Cream with Cooling Action
• Dermatologist Recommended
• Clinically Proven to Soothe Extra Dry, Cracked Skin
• Natural Colloidal Oatmeal
• Shea Butter


Ingredients

Water, Glycerin, Distearyldimonium Chloride, Petrolatum, Cetyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Ceteareth-20, Cetearyl Alcohol, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Flour, Di-ppg-3, Myristyl Ether Adipate, Benzyl Alcohol, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Oil, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Menthol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter) Extract, Sodium Chloride-(F#10241-078)

Directions

Apply on skin after showering with AVEENO Skin Relief Body Wash Fragrance Free, or whenever skin feels dry and irritated

USAGE ADVICE

Aveeno Skin Relief Moisturising Cream is even great on rough areas like heels, elbows and knees.
